project_abstract.cdata: The project would include: (a) extension of Seliste interceptor by about 8 kms; (b) reconstruction of about 14.5 kms of Sava river dike; (c) construction of subsurface and surface drainage systems; (d) construction of one new pumping station, increasing capacity of an existing pumping station and repair of two pumping stations; (e) construction of about 170 kms of paved and unpaved roads; (f) land consolidation and on-farm development; (g) provision of equipment for project operation and maintenance; (h) provision of farm equipment to intensify agriculture; (i) provision of equipment for agricultural extension and research; and (j) feasibility studies for future land and water development projects in SRBH.
